name: Tentacle Temptation
description:
A dangerous slime is on the loose!

With its abilities you can solve novel and progressively difficult levels in order to please your harem of beautiful women. A questionable, brain-teasing hentai adventure to break into the mind.

With every possible conquest you will be able to solve maze-like puzzles and clear a mind-breaking challenge.

Enjoy the game with
3 special abilities to help you solve challenging puzzles.
Special objects in every level there will be that could help or hinder your progress. Better be careful with what you touch!
A gallery to see your progress in the game
25 maze puzzles and 5 block-breaking final levels, make up for 30 engaging levels to please your partners.
